about_the_game:
THE SOURCEWORLDS

SourceWorlds is a co-op action-adventure game that takes you into the surreal world of the "Architect". Master quests, loot legendary items, defeat dastardly enemies, explore the mysterious game world with your friends, or give them a chinlock in the PvP arena.

You accidentally get drawn into the artificial world of the "Architect".
With the help of unusual items and weapons, it's up to you to find a way out of this madness and return to the real world.

Destroy your opponents with a wide variety of weapons and items! With the stop sign to the face, spawn a dwarf army and use the hook to ambush your enemies. Drive ships over land, cars over robot armies or use the dragon to create an inferno.



Actually, you just wanted to spend a relaxing retro gaming session with your buddy and some old consoles.
Somehow, though, you seem to be having some damn bad luck right now, and so you're whisked away to an alien world (Jumanji, ring any bells?).

You'll quickly find out that SourceWorlds is a very strange place.
Different ages, different cultures, everything seems to be interwoven - and unfortunately, they are not the worlds from our childhood.

The Architect seems to be the all-encompassing and corrupting force in this world. To return to reality you'll have to work with him, hopefully he's up to no good!

STORY MODE

Fight with your friends (up to 4 players) or alone with Rolf the lost NPC through three crazy worlds.
Complete the main quest, complete side quests, explore the world and find the Secret Dungeons along the way!
Loot gold to go shopping at various merchants.

DUNGEON MODE

Procedurally generated roguelike dungeons and island worlds.
Fight alone or up to many players through the endless worlds and master the increasingly difficult challenges.
The worlds change with every visit!
Loot the diamond currency to find even better items from Giacomo!

PVP MODE

Play Last Man Standing in a variety of different worlds!
Use your weapons and items from the story and dungeon modes to show your friends who's boss.

FEATURES:

    Local single player mode
  • Online multiplayer mode: Play in co-op mode with up to four players.
  • Host your own servers / SourceWorld.
  • Play through funny quests and let the story sink in!
  • Explore a variety of locations such as a medieval castle, a Caribbean sea, or a futuristic sci-fi world!
  • Play against your friends in the PVP (Last Man Standing) arena. Use the many combinable weapons and items to flatten them!
  • Find more than 170 powerful weapons and items with which you can mow down your enemies.
  • Swords, daggers, axes, hammers, stop shields, miniguns - whatever your heart desires!
  • Discover magical and mysterious accessories that will give you mythical abilities. Become a white mage, use explosive magic or throw a meteor at hordes of enemies.
  • Loot gold and buy wacky items in a variety of stores!
  • Jump behind the wheel of vehicles for which the laws of physics are more of a recommendation. Choose from ships, hovering cars, a rideable wolf and even dragons!
  • Collect unique masks to give your character your own look.
  • Community-Driven: Some players have already received an in-game tribute (weapon, island, ect.).
  • Experience our best silly humor and game design!

FURTHER DEVELOPMENT

:SourceWorlds is our ongoing project. We plan to grow our game with the community and continue to deliver content.

Help us with the development and join our Discord:


TideOver Studios
